Package StaffManagement

Interface StaffFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
hospitalStaffManagement
public interface StaffFilter
The StaffFilter interface defines a contract for filtering staff data. Implementing classes should provide a method to apply a filtering condition on staff records.

The primary method of this interface is filteredView(String, String), which evaluates whether a given staff record meets a specific condition based on the provided filtering criteria.

Since:
2024-11-06
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tan Guang Wei

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    filteredView(String category, String type)
    Applies a filtering condition to a staff record.

  • Method Details

    • filteredView

      void filteredView(String category, String type)
      Applies a filtering condition to a staff record.

      This method allows filtering staff data based on specific categories and types. Implementing classes should define how to handle the filtering based on the provided criteria.

      Parameters:
      category - The category by which the staff record will be filtered (e.g., role, department).
      type - The type or value to match against within the given category (e.g., specific role, department name)..
